alert.note: Alert for Shasta (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 2:56PM PDT until June 10 at 3:15PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM PDT FOR EAST CENTRAL SHASTA COUNTY... At 255 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Viola, or 11 miles east of Shingletown, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Viola and Manzanita Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
